NO_FOUND_MOD: No mods found, press B to exit.
FPS_TEXT: This is an FPS enhancement mod. After installation, it can unlock the game's FPS.
HD_TEXT: This is a graphics enhancement mod. After installation, it can improve graphics quality.
CHEAT_TEXT: This is a cheat code mod. After installation, you can use cheat codes.
COSMETIC_TEXT: This is a cosmetic mod. After installation, it can beautify game content.
NONE_TEXT:
This mod has no tag set. Add a [Type] tag at the end of the mod name.
For detailed information, please press START on the main menu to view.
PLAY_TEXT: This is a more gameplay mod. After installation, it can enhance game gameplay.
INSTRUCTION_LINE_2: ・Mod Path: mods2 \ Game Name [Ver Tag] \ Game ID \ Mod Name [Type Tag] \ Files
INSTRUCTION_LINE_3: ・Multiple mods under Game ID path, e.g., Mod1 [Type], Mod2 [Type].
INSTRUCTION_LINE_4: ・Here is an example of an contents mod:
INSTRUCTION_LINE_6: ・Here is an example of an exefs_patches mod:
INSTRUCTION_LINE_8: ・Tag format: [X] (X=tag). Avoid [] in non-tag path content to prevent errors.
INSTRUCTION_LINE_9: ・Mod version tag: Enter actual version (numbers only). E.g., V1.2.0 → [1.2.0].
INSTRUCTION_LINE_11: ・Switch file system doesn't support Chinese; use English, numbers, punctuation only or unrecognized.
INSTRUCTION_LINE_12: ・No tags in path won’t affect usage, but recommended for better management.
INSTRUCTION_LINE_13: • Game and mod name mapping guide below.
INSTRUCTION_LINE_14: • Mapped names replace original folder names in the plugin.
INSTRUCTION_LINE_15: • Game mapping file path: SD \ mods2 \ game_name.json
INSTRUCTION_LINE_19: • Mod mapping path: SD \ mods2 \ game_name[version] \ ID \ mod_name.json
INSTRUCTION_LINE_24: • Pay attention to braces when editing. Templates are provided.
